requirements.requirement_text: The bidder must not be a government employee, except for those who have been authorized to engage in non-governmental activities.
The bidder must not be a bankrupt or insolvent person.
The bidder must not be a company that has been dissolved or liquidated.
The bidder must not be a person under the age of 18.
The bidder must not be a person with a disability.

The bidder must provide the required documents, including a commercial register, a classification certificate, a zakat certificate, a tax certificate, a social insurance certificate, a chamber of commerce certificate, and a Saudi nationality certificate.
The bidder must not have any conflicts of interest with the government agency.
The bidder must comply with the rules of professional conduct and ethics.
The bidder must not disclose any confidential information related to the competition.
The bidder must not publish any information about the competition without the government agency's prior written consent.
The bidder must not retain any documents or copies of documents related to the competition.
The bidder must not use any intellectual property rights related to the competition without the government agency's prior written consent.
The bidder must comply with the local content preference regulation.
The bidder must not submit a proposal that is 25% or more lower than the estimated cost and prevailing market prices.
The bidder must submit a proposal that meets the requirements of the competition.
The bidder must agree to the terms and conditions of the competition.
